release.action: Changed name of OpenLREncoderRuntimeException to OpenLREncoderProcessingException to avoid confusion about the fact that it's not of type java.lang.RuntimeException
Bug fixes.
Add area location support.
Fix handling of locations longer than 15km.
Adapt changes in the data package.
Make use of lfrc value to reduce the size of the search area during shortest-path calculation.
Refactor adding of intermediate LRP is max diatsnce is exceeded.
Refactor determination of intermediates during shortest-path calculation.
Implementation of location interface moved to data package.
add hashCode and equals method to all data classes
location/location reference database make use of hashCodes
encapsulate open list and best value storage into one class RouteSearchData
use of consistent location/(raw) location reference identifier
add name and explanation to error code
implement return code instead of exceptions
split location and raw location depending on location type
check for loops of a single line and add intermediate lrp
create location factory
add raw location reference data to location reference holder
adapt raw location reference interface
add toString methods for data classes
enable encoding using a properties object (instead of inputstream)
reduce memory consumption
add side of road and orientation for point locations
implement point location support
check offset values
add property to encoder configuration for choosing a physical format version
Encoder package does not depend on binary package anymore.
Encoder finds available output formats using Java services.
Encoder reads and provides data using the OpenLR data interfaces.
Encoder throws OpenLRRuntimeException if encoding is not possible at all and it reports not encodable locations using OpenLREncoderExceptions.
Initial release of the OpenLR encoder package.
